# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate that receives timecode updates from the timecode generator.

## Declaration

```swift
var delegate: (any AVCaptureTimecodeGeneratorDelegate)? { get }
```

## Discussion

You can use your [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureTimecodeGenerator/delegate] to receive real-time timecode updates. Implement the `timecodeGenerator:didReceiveUpdate:` method in your delegate to handle updates.

## Handling delegate callbacks

- **delegateCallbackQueue**: The dispatch queue on which delegate callbacks are invoked.
